scripts.db:migrate: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db:deploy: railway run sequelize --env=production db:migrate:undo:all && railway run sequelize --env=production db:migrate && railway run sequelize --env=production db:seed:all && railway up
scripts.db:test: sequelize --env=test db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize --env=test db:migrate && sequelize --env=test db:seed:all
